verbose_text: MgSO 4 has been found to block NMDA receptors occupying the binding sites within these ion channels preventing the neuronal cell damage caused by activation of these receptors and this could explain the neuro-protective effect of MgSO 4 in cases of Hypoxic-ischemic encephalopathy [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: MgSO 4  has been found to block NMDA receptors
